      • retrieve

        public Passage retrieve()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from class: AbstractVerse
        Download the verse from the internet. Should always be called from a non-UI thread, as it must access the internet which will throw an exception if run on the UI thread.
        Specified by:
